Texts.Chs: 把^orange;钢铁短剑^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;steel warblade^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 优秀，希望你能享受切割物品的快感。这是我给你的。
Texts.Eng: Excellent, enjoy cutting stuff up. Here, take this off my hands.

Texts.Chs: 嗯？我就直截了当地说了吧。你的武器不够锋利。建议你把^green;军备作坊^reset;升级一下，然后制造一把^orange;钢铁短剑^reset;，等它到你手上的时候我发誓你会爱上它的。
Texts.Eng: I'll be blunt. That weapon of yours isn't sharp enough. Go craft a ^orange;steel warblade^reset; in your ^green;armory^reset;! You'll love it!
